channel.title: Jetpack on Brighton Kotlin
channel.description: Recent content in Jetpack on Brighton Kotlin

item.title: Compose your Trill by Luca Nicoletti
item.description: The June Brighton Kotlin meetup takes place on Thursday 27th June at 6 pm GMT. We will be opening zoom just before 6pm for people to gather and chat. The link will be sent out on the day of the talk. The event will begin around 6pm. We’ll be welcoming our second speaker - Luca Nicoletti who will give a talk called Compose your Trill This talk will cover the following topic:

item.title: Introducing Compose for Desktop by Sebastian Aigner
item.description: Some time ago, JetBrains published versions of Compose for Desktop â€“ a modern UI framework for Kotlin that makes building performant and beautiful user interfaces for Desktop applications easy and enjoyable. In this talk, We will learn a bit about the principles and technology behind Compose for Desktop, and see what it takes to get started with building UIs in pure Kotlin! Bio Seb is a Kotlin Developer Advocate at JetBrains
